name: slark_spawn_04
text: If I'd known I'd end up here, I'd have stayed in Dark Reef Prison.
text_simple: if id known id end up here id have stayed in dark reef prison

name: slark_spawn_05
text: Oh no, you'll bait no hook with me.

name: slark_battlebegins_01
text: Stay out of my way and maybe you won't get hurt, but I doubt it.

text: First Blood! I've been wanting to say that since this all began.

name: slark_kill_01
text: Slark had his way with you.
text_simple: slark had his way with you

name: slark_kill_02
text: Oh, you were an ugly one.
text_simple: oh you were an ugly one

name: slark_kill_03
text: You wanted out of here, didn't you?
text_simple: you wanted out of here didnt you

name: slark_kill_04
text: Go on, get out of here.
text_simple: go on get out of here

name: slark_kill_05
text: Your body was a cage, I just let you free!

name: slark_kill_06
text: You never felt my shiv, did ya?
text_simple: you never felt my shiv did ya

name: slark_rival_01
text: You think you're deep, I'll show you deep.
text_simple: you think youre deep ill show you deep

name: slark_rival_02
text: Sometimes the little fish eats the big fish.
text_simple: sometimes the little fish eats the big fish

name: slark_rival_03
pretty_criteria: Killing Naga Siren (20% chance)|A silver hero chat wheel was used

name: slark_rival_04
text: I was under you the whole time, drilling holes in your hull.
text_simple: i was under you the whole time drilling holes in your hull

name: slark_rival_05
text: Where you're going, you won't need any eyes.
text_simple: where youre going you wont need any eyes

name: slark_rival_08
text: I know your type, Riki. Common sneak thief.
text_simple: i know your type riki common sneak thief

name: slark_rival_10
text: You want to bleed me? I'll bleed you.
text_simple: you want to bleed me ill bleed you

name: slark_rival_11
text: Just let me carve in my initials.
text_simple: just let me carve in my initials

name: slark_rival_12
text: Fine assassin you turned out to be.
text_simple: fine assassin you turned out to be

name: slark_rival_13
text: Don't track me down if you can't finish the job.
text_simple: dont track me down if you cant finish the job

name: slark_ally_01
text: I've got your back, Tidehunter. I promise not to stab it.
text_simple: ive got your back tidehunter i promise not to stab it
pretty_criteria: Tidehunter is nearby at between 1 minute and 11 minutes in

name: slark_ally_02
text: Well hello, Pudge. That's a hell of a fish hook.
text_simple: well hello pudge thats a hell of a fish hook
pretty_criteria: Pudge is nearby at between 1 minute and 11 minutes in

name: slark_ally_03
text: I knew a Slithereen just like you doing hard time in Dark Reef.
text_simple: i knew a slithereen just like you doing hard time in dark reef
pretty_criteria: Slardar is nearby at between 1 minute and 11 minutes in

name: slark_ally_04
text: Guess my head's not worth enough for you, Gondar.
text_simple: guess my heads not worth enough for you gondar

name: slark_ally_05
text: Don't listen to the critics, Naga, I love your voice.
text_simple: dont listen to the critics naga i love your voice

name: slark_ally_06
text: Go on, Siren, sing em a sweet lullabye.

name: slark_death_02
text: Ah, no cell can hold me.
text_simple: ah no cell can hold me

name: slark_death_10
text: Oh that's a change of plans.
text_simple: oh thats a change of plans

name: slark_death_12
text: I shoulda had a Plan B.
text_simple: i shoulda had a plan b

name: slark_fastres_01
text: You think you caught me? Ha ha ha ha ha!
text_simple: you think you caught me ha ha ha ha ha

name: slark_respawn_03
text: The air's so thick I'm choking on it.
text_simple: the airs so thick im choking on it

name: slark_respawn_05
text: The worst day fishing is still better than the best day of being dead.
text_simple: the worst day fishing is still better than the best day of being dead

name: slark_respawn_10
text: Escaping death is easy when you've broken out of Dark Reef.
text_simple: escaping death is easy when youve broken out of dark reef

name: slark_lasthit_10
text: I don't mind if I do.
text_simple: i dont mind if i do

name: slark_rare_01
text: Alone is best but sometimes you need mates. Worse comes to worst, you can always eat em.
text_simple: alone is best but sometimes you need mates worse comes to worst you can always eat em

name: slark_rare_02
text: Plots and plans come to nothing when you're teamed with a bunch of loudmouths and losers. That's why when it was my time to make a break from Dark Reef Prison, I worked alone.
text_simple: plots and plans come to nothing when youre teamed with a bunch of loudmouths and losers thats why when it was my time to make a break from dark reef prison i worked alone

name: slark_rare_03
text: My worst nightmare. It's a dream I have. I'm in a square cell, glass walls, just me and a little castle. I'll take Dark Reef over that any time.
text_simple: my worst nightmare its a dream i have im in a square cell glass walls just me and a little castle ill take dark reef over that any time

text: I punched a lot of tickets for this.
text_simple: i punched a lot of tickets for this

name: slark_purch_03
